page.title: 04CATTLE AND IMPLEMENTS
page.content:
In our area the farms are modern and quite big. Most farms have a milking parlour and in between twenty and two hundred cows. The cows are mostly Friesians.
One of the smallest farms is Lower Hem, and the Woodlands is one of the biggest. The farm implements are plough, drill, spinner, trailer, bailer, forage harvester and combines. The makes of machines are: Holland,New Holland, Deutz Farr; while tractors are made by: Ford, Case, International,John Deere, Intercase, Leyland,Massey Fergusson, Mecerdes Benz,Marshalls.
The ground is good for tractor working and for grazing cows.
